jobs_results.title: Automotive Expert with Advanced Android Skills
jobs_results.description:
Luxoft is seeking a skilled Automotive Expert to join its agile project development team for an ongoing development project of state-of-the-art and innovative functionalities and technologies.

Responsibilities include working within an intercultural team of many layers and competencies around software engineering, architecture, and development. Primarily responsible for analyzing results of Google's CTS tests and identifying any issues that impact the successful execution of CTS.

We are looking for someone with deep expertise in Google CTS tests, strong Android skills (5+ years experience), strong C++ skills (5+ years experience), strong Java skills (5+ years experience), and experience working with Git. Docker, AUTOSAR, Linux, Gerrit, GitHub, AOSP, Atlassian Confluence, and Atlassian Jira knowledge is desirable but not necessary.

The ideal candidate will have strong analytical and problem-solving skills, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work collaboratively in a global team. We offer a competitive salary range of $120,000 - $180,000 per year, depending on location and experience, and a comprehensive benefits package including health insurance, retirement plan, and paid time off.

QualificationLS | 2nd cycle university degreeWeekly Hours40Posted: 22 August 2023As a leading Cybersecurity company in Defense and Government industries, negg is looking for an Android Developer.The ideal candidate is a self-motivated, multi-tasker, and demonstrated team-player.

You will be focused on the Android development, crucial and preliminary for Reverse Engineering/Exploitation activities (rooting etc).About the roleThe ideal candidate will have the chance to be part of a very high technological scenario and go through challenging national/international projects.Hard SkillsExpertise in Android development (native)Good knowledge of Android Operating SystemGood knowledge and expertise in Java developmentGood knowledge and expertise of NDK is a plusOther SkillsAbility to write clean, high-quality, high-performance and maintainable codeAbility/Eager to support software including applications, database integration, interfaces, and new functionality enhancementsAbility/Keen to test and deploy new products and featuresProactive and able to think "out-of-the-box"Available to travel abroadFluent English is requiredDemonstrated analytical and problem solving skillsAbility to organize and prioritize workQualificationsBachelor's degree in Computer Science (or related field)2-3+ years of relevant work experiencePassion for reverse engineering works is a plus.HQ: Rome (centre) or Reggio Calabria + Smart Working / remote workingFurther info about the role and tasks will be provided during the selection process.The interested candidates, of either sex, can send a detailed curriculum vitae, complete with photos and authorization for the processing of personal data (GDPR Regulation EU 2016/679).

jobs_results.title: Coder, Engineer, Developer, Hacker. Whatever you want to call yourself :D
jobs_results.location: Naples, Metropolitan City of Naples, Italy
jobs_results.description:
👋 Hey, We're Pushapp Lab

Pushapp Lab is improving the odds of startup success, empowering anyone to impact the world through entrepreneurship.

We’re here so founders who see the future differently get the skills they need to make it a reality.

Our team supports the startups we invest in. Just like top athletes, entrepreneurs need brilliant coaches. We’re those experts, the difference is we’re not afraid to get stuck in too. Creating something exponentially more valuable to them than just cash.

We’re here to make that happen.

It matters to us that we’re powering a better future. For us, that means funding people free from any bias and supporting businesses that we’re proud to show anyone. If that’s something you’re passionate about too, then we’re off to a good start. Even better if the thought of working with a variety of startups with all of their uncertainties and challenges sounds like the place you could do your best work.

About you

♟Reasoning and depth of learning. We expect you to be creative enough to solve most challenging problems independently, given the necessary knowledge. You learn new concepts and skills rapidly, and look to understand stuff truly in depth.

🏎Drive. You’re energetic, hard-working, and persevere through adversity until the job is done, and done well. You get turned on by getting results, and always aim for excellence in what you do.

👨‍🚀Curiosity and initiative. You love exploring and you’re entrepreneurial in seeking out new opportunities and testing new ideas of your own accord. You don’t just wait to be told what to do all the time.

⛳Pragmatism. Far from being too academic or obsessive in your perfectionism, you understand that, when getting things done in a competitive world, speed is often as important as quality.

⛩Humbleness. You’re down to earth, eager to listen to people’s feedback and constructive criticism, and ready to get your hands dirty with whatever the team needs to succeed.

The Startups

Our full portfolio can be found here: pushapplab.com

What is most important and universal across all the companies is a healthy 'risk appetite'.

Our proposition is very simple. For 6 months you will be challenged to do the best work you have ever done. At the end you will have two possibilities:

🦄Best case scenario: You have built a unicorn and have equity

🙈Worst case scenario: You have an amazing story that will open doors for you for the rest of your career.

Tech

- Production experience coding iOS or Android apps

- Modern thinker around testing and release practices. Waterfall is dead

- Hands on mentality.

- The ability to explain tech to non-techs.

- Know good devs that you would want to join forces with.

Benefits

- Autonomy, Freedom!

- Equity in the success that you built

- Working from home and flexible hours when you want

What next?

Apply and we will message within 48 hours with an interview request if you are successful

jobs_results.title: Rabona srl: Sviluppatore App iOS e Android con Conoscenze PHP/WordPress
jobs_results.location: Rome, Metropolitan City of Rome Capital, Italy
jobs_results.description:
Rabona srl è alla ricerca di un Sviluppatore App iOS e Android con Conoscenze PHP/WordPress

Azienda attiva nel settore delle telecomunicazioni nazionali e internazionali ricerca sviluppatorio con esperienza nell'ambito app development, in particolare su piattaforme iOS e Android e competenze avanzate in PHP, WordPress per siti ecommerce integrati attraverso API.

Zona di lavoro: Roma via tiburtina altezza GRA, all'interno del consorzio Tecnocittà.

Compiti
• Sviluppo e manutenzione di applicazioni per iOS e Android.
• Collaborazione con il team di progettazione e altri sviluppatori per implementare nuove funzionalità.
• Ottimizzazione delle prestazioni delle applicazioni.
• Integrazione di API e servizi web.
• Sviluppo e personalizzazione di siti web utilizzando PHP e WordPress.
• Intergrazione funzionalità ed interazione con il Back-end

Requisiti
• Esperienza comprovata nello sviluppo di app per iOS e Android.
• Conoscenza approfondita di Swift per iOS e Kotlin/Java per Android.
• Competenze avanzate in PHP e esperienza con WordPress.
• Familiarità con la progettazione di interfacce utente responsive.
• Capacità di risolvere problemi in modo creativo e di lavorare in modo autonomo.
• Ottime capacità di comunicazione e collaborazione.

jobs_results.title: Flutter Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: European Union

Who we are
We’re an award-winning development agency at the heart of Vilnius City with clients all around the world. Being a premier development agency we only work for the best, with the best. We specialize in web & mobile development and bespoke UX/UI design. No matter how big or small our client’s organization and budgets are, we’ve got a solution for them. This means you have a chance to work with both small and medium-sized businesses. We also provide outsourcing & outstaffing services to our clients.
What we are looking for
Looking for a Flutter developer for a full-time job as a contractor in our clients team.

Day to Day
• Flutter application development
• Working together with other developers, project manager and UX/UI designer to build smooth & scalable app
• Learn best software development practises with your colleagues
• Contribute to quality by identifying spots of improvements
• Experience with REST API, HTTPS
You are someone who has...
• At least 2 years experience as a Software Developer
• At least 2 year experience with Flutter SDK and Dart language
• Rich experience in different screens layouting/supporting
• Experience in building at least 1 Android and/ or iOS application using Flutter
• Understanding and experience with state-management patterns: Provider, BLoC / MobX
• Strong experience with Git / Git Flow
• Strong communication, problem-solving skills
• Fluency in English language
• Experience (as an advantage) with Flutter for Web, Flutter for Desktop/ Flutter Platform Channels; in Android development (Android SDK)/ iOS development (Xcode, iOS SDK); with Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban)
Why you’ll love working with Scale3C
• Work with some of the world’s leading and most recognized brands
• Have the opportunity to work 100% remote from any country around Europe
• Office in Vilnius city center
• Cool and vibrant work environmentInterested in the position? We are looking forward to your application, to connect and talk more!

Best regards,
Talent acquisition team

This offer from "Scale3C" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Sviluppatore Jr Android
jobs_results.description:
Sviluppatore Android Jr

Tradenet, società leader nello sviluppo dell’App ZotSell.com , offre un ambiente di lavoro piacevole, giovane, dinamico, prospettive di crescita e la possibilità di partecipare allo sviluppo di progetti interessanti. E’ alla ricerca, per la sede di Schio, di un Android Developer per lo sviluppo e la manutenzione di applicazioni mobile su piattaforma Android.

Conoscenze e competenze necessarie:
• Conoscenza Base del linguaggio Java o Kotlin
• Oppure Conoscenza Base ed esperienza di un linguaggio di programmazione ad Oggetti

Costituiscono titolo preferenziale:
• Conoscenza Avanzata del linguaggio Kotlin
• Conoscenza ed esperienza nello sviluppo di Applicazioni Mobile Android per Smartphone e Tablet
• Conoscenza della Clean architecture
• Conoscenza della Dependency Injection
• Conoscenza del Test Driven Development
• Conoscenza delle guidelines dell’SDK Android
• Ottima esperienza nell’uso di Android Studio
• Esperienza nello sviluppo di applicazioni che interagiscono con servizi web RESTful
• Attitudine al lavoro in team
• Conoscenza di GIT

Tipo di contratto:

Tempo pieno, Tempo determinato, Tempo indeterminato

La presente offerta si intende rivolta ad ambosessi ai sensi della L.903/77. Gli interessati possono inviare il proprio curriculum vitae corredato di foto e di autorizzazione al trattamento dei dati personali al seguente indirizzo mail:

MARKETING@ZOTSELL.COM
